title: Is oil on face or oil near mouth after eating oily food a barrier when making wudu? assim al hakeem
transcript: sh my face is oily naturally and after eating oily food my lips and some parts around my mouth is being oily and when these two combine I feel a layer on my skin can it be a barrier no it's best no it's not a barrier if you wash your face in woodo and gargle water in your mouth this is fine
